results.title: Type-safe Database access with Prisma
results.description: Episode Type-safe Database access with Prisma VS Code Livestreams Prisma provides an excellent modeling language for defining your database, as well as a powerful ORM for working with SQL in JavaScript. The Prisma VS Code extension makes modeling data models fun and intuitive. Prisma provides an excellent modeling language for defining your.
